channel.title: Clients on linux dont work if you know how to fix please post im on ubuntu
channel.description:
im having trouble to get most webclients and all downloaded clients working on linux even with wine please help (yes i have the fully updated jre and jdk to) i get "sorry, an error has occured willest loading runescape." for webclients and
then on dl clients the command promp just opens and closes or on some says file not found and ive tried editing the directorys
